text: Grace Elizabeth Reidy Comiskey (October 18891900 United States Federal Census – December 10, 1956) was an American businesswoman who was the owner of the Chicago White Sox of the American League from through . Comiskey was the daughter-in-law of Charles Comiskey and inherited control of the White Sox upon the death of her husband, J. Louis Comiskey. Control of the White Sox passed to Comiskey's eldest daughter, Dorothy Comiskey Rigney, upon her death. She died of a heart attack in 1956.Pacific Stars and Stripes, Tuesday, December 11, 1956, Tokyo, Japan, Japan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1956 deaths Category:1889 births Category:Date of birth uncertain Category:Major League Baseball owners Category:Chicago White Sox owners Category:Chicago White Sox executives Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Grace
title: Grace Comiskey
